sentences.sContent: Next, I called a travel agent whose telephone number I found in a newspaper.
sentences.sCn: 接下来，我在报纸上查到一家旅行社代理人的电话号码，给他打了电话。

sentences.sContent: In Mianyang, a city close to the hardest-hit areas, travel agent Zhang Guangqing ignores the temporary travel ban.
sentences.sCn: 但在靠近重灾区的绵阳市，旅行社代理商张广清（音）根本无视这个临时旅游禁令。

synos.tran: 旅行社；旅行代理人，旅行代办人

trans.tranCn: 旅行代办人；旅行代理人
trans.tranOther: someone who owns or works in a travel agency
